about_the_game:
Mystic Pub

Step into Mystic Pub, an atmospheric tavern caught between realms, where spirits of departed souls gather to linger over drinks and share their tales. As the pub's bartender, you’re not just a drink mixer—you’re a listener, a confidante, and a guide, helping souls come to terms with their unfinished business. In this cozy yet eerie haven, your simple choices and interactions may just be the key to their peace.

Features:

  • Interactive Storytelling: Meet a cast of intriguing female spirits, each with unique backgrounds. Listen to their stories of love, regret, and redemption, offering them the comfort of a listening ear and the warmth of a well-mixed drink.

  • Heaven and Hell Paths: Through your interactions, spirits may find peace and ascend or remain unresolved. Spirits you’ve helped move on might be seen again in either the Heaven Pub or the Hell Pub, where you can continue to interact with them in their afterlife.

  • Bartending with Purpose: Mix drinks that help soothe or stir deeper reflections. Your choice of drink affects their mood and subtly influences their path.

  • Rare Events and Special Moments: Every few nights, a rare encounter may occur—a heartfelt connection, a surprising revelation, or a unique response that keeps each evening fresh.

  • Eerie Atmosphere and Engaging Visuals: With animated backgrounds, ambient sounds, and beautiful art, each night at Mystic Pub immerses you further into its otherworldly setting.

In Mystic Pub, your role isn’t to change fate but to be a quiet presence in the shadows, listening and offering comfort. Pour a drink, lend an ear, and experience the bittersweet stories of souls bound to this unique place between worlds.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content that may not be suitable for all ages or appropriate for viewing at work. Players will encounter mature themes such as dealing with unresolved past issues, romance, and adult relationships. There are occasional suggestive dialogues and innuendos, as well as references to emotional struggles and spiritual beliefs. Mystic Pub is not suitable for players under the age of 18.

name: Mystic Pub

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit versions of Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In Mystic Pub, you’re a bartender in a supernatural tavern for lingering souls. Serve drinks, listen to stories, and guide spirits toward peace or further unrest. Uncover their tales, experience rare events, and witness where each soul’s journey takes them—heaven, hell, or beyond.
